attributes.action: Bring the troops out of Iraq and Afghanistan now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
THe Iraq war and the Afghanistan war have both been disasters in every possible way. The recent bombing of the Iraqi Parliament shows that security can never be properly established there with any amount of force.

Too many UK soldiers have died in thid senseless and bloody war, we must withdraw now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
